hereToHelpPara.text: Soins Karismä offers the highest service for customer support. The help center is here to help you with any questions, concerns or inquiries you may have. Please feel free to contact us using any of the three methods listed below. Depending on the hour, we will contact you back as quickly as possible. We ask our clients for a maximum delay of 2 hours as a response time. Thank you!

address.text: 249 Rue Saint-Jacques #200, Montreal, Quebec H2Y 1M6, Canada
